skill.name: cookbook-audit
skill.description: Audit an Anthropic Cookbook notebook based on a rubric. Use whenever a notebook review or audit is requested.
skill.summary: Quality assurance skill for auditing Cookbook notebooks using a standardized rubric.
skill.author: Anthropic

security_audit.summary: Quality assurance tool for notebook validation. Uses trusted subprocess tools (uv, jupyter nbconvert, detect-secrets) for automated checks. Creates gitignored temp directory for output. No credential access or data exfiltration detected.

content.user_title: Audit Cookbook notebooks with a standardized rubric
content.value_statement: Cookbook notebooks need consistent quality standards to ensure users can learn effectively. This skill provides automated validation checks and a comprehensive rubric for reviewing notebook quality, narrative flow, code quality, and technical accuracy.
actual_capabilities: Run automated validation checks on Jupyter notebooks
Detect hardcoded API keys and secrets using detect-secrets
Convert notebooks to markdown for easier review
Check for introduction, prerequisites, and conclusion sections
Validate code quality patterns and variable naming
Generate comprehensive audit reports with scoring
limitations: Does not execute notebook code to verify correctness
Automated checks supplement but do not replace manual review
Requires uv and detect-secrets to be available

use_cases.title: Quality checks before publishing
use_cases.description: Validate new cookbooks meet style guidelines and contain no secrets before publication.

use_cases.title: Automated notebook review
use_cases.description: Use as first-pass review to catch common issues and standardize feedback across reviews.

use_cases.title: Self-review before submission
use_cases.description: Check your own notebooks against the rubric to improve quality before sharing.

prompt_templates.title: Quick audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run cookbook-audit on [notebook_path] to check for issues.

prompt_templates.title: Full review
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit [notebook_path] using the cookbook-audit skill. Run automated checks, review against style_guide.md rubric, and provide a complete audit report.

prompt_templates.title: Focused check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check [notebook_path] for hardcoded secrets and verify the introduction section follows the cookbook style guidelines.

prompt_templates.title: Comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit both [notebook_1] and [notebook_2] using cookbook-audit. Compare their scores and provide specific recommendations for each.

output: WARNINGS: Introduction mentions prerequisites but may be too brief
Recommended next steps: Add more context to introduction section, ensure learning objectives are clearly stated

best_practices: Always run automated checks before manual review to catch technical issues first
Reference style_guide.md for specific examples of good and bad notebook patterns
Provide specific, actionable feedback with line references rather than vague comments
anti_patterns: Accepting notebooks without checking for hardcoded API keys or secrets
Skipping the automated validation step and going straight to manual review
Providing generic feedback without specific examples from the notebook

faq.question: What file types does this skill support?
faq.answer: Only Jupyter notebooks (.ipynb files) are supported. The skill validates notebook structure and content.

faq.question: What models does this skill work with?
faq.answer: The skill validates notebook code uses valid Anthropic model names: claude-sonnet-4-5, claude-haiku-4-5, or claude-opus-4-5.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my notebook?
faq.answer: No. The skill creates a read-only markdown version in the tmp/ folder for easier review. Your original notebook remains unchanged.

faq.question: Is my notebook data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill only reads your notebook and outputs a markdown review file. No data is sent externally beyond trusted tools like detect-secrets.

faq.question: What if detect-secrets is not installed?
faq.answer: The skill falls back to basic regex pattern matching for common secret formats. Install detect-secrets for more comprehensive scanning.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual review?
faq.answer: Automated checks catch technical issues like secrets and formatting. Manual review evaluates narrative quality, pedagogical effectiveness, and clarity.
